keyMoments.title: Vergo Appears Before Law
keyMoments.description: Vergo appears in the laboratory and confronts Law, revealing their shared past and his role as a spy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Vergo as a major antagonist with connections to Law's backstory and Doflamingo's organization.

keyMoments.title: Vergo Defeats Law
keyMoments.description: Vergo instantly defeats Law in combat, demonstrating overwhelming strength and haki abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Vergo as a formidable combatant capable of defeating powerful opponents.

abilities.description: Vergo demonstrates exceptional mastery of Armament Haki, strong enough to overpower Law.

relationships.description: Vergo knows Law from the past, implying a connection through Doflamingo's organization. He greets Law familiarly.

evolutionMoments.description: Vergo encounters Law in the laboratory and reveals their shared history.

relationships.description: Vergo was sent to monitor Caesar as a spy due to distrust of the scientist.

reveals.information: Revealed as a spy sent by Doflamingo to monitor Caesar Clown
Has a past connection with Trafalgar Law

keyMoments.title: Kin'emon Fully Revealed and Named
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon, now fully reassembled, formally introduces himself as Kin'emon of Foxfire from Kuri in Wano Country.
keyMoments.significance: First formal introduction revealing his name and origin from Wano Country.

keyMoments.title: Foxfire Style Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon demonstrates his Foxfire Style swordsmanship, cutting through fire and destroying parts of Smiley.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the legendary Wano Foxfire Style technique.

abilities.description: A sword style that allows the user to cut through fire itself, both defensively and offensively.

relationships.description: Zoro expresses interest in Kin'emon's Foxfire Style and offers to help rescue his son.

evolutionMoments.description: Zoro volunteers to help Kin'emon after seeing his Foxfire Style.

relationships.description: Sanji risks his life to rescue Kin'emon's torso from the poisonous lake.

reveals.information: Looking for his son who was taken to the laboratory

keyMoments.title: Gas Robe Attack
keyMoments.description: Caesar demonstrates his Gas Robe technique, generating clouds of poisonous gas.
keyMoments.significance: First showcase of Caesar's signature gas-manipulation combat technique.

keyMoments.title: Gastanet Explosion
keyMoments.description: Caesar uses castanets filled with unstable gas to create massive explosions.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates creative weaponization of gas abilities.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Defeats Multiple Opponents
keyMoments.description: Caesar systematically defeats Luffy, Robin, Franky, Smoker, and Tashigi using his gas powers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Caesar as a formidable threat capable of defeating multiple powerful fighters.

abilities.description: Caesar generates clouds of poisonous gas and sends them towards enemies.
Caesar fills castanets with unstable gas and slams them together to create explosions.
Caesar can remove oxygen from an area, suffocating opponents without visible attacks.

reveals.information: Can manipulate oxygen to suffocate opponents
Uses Gas Robe and Gastanet techniques

keyMoments.title: Poison Immunity Revealed
keyMoments.description: Luffy reveals his poison immunity developed from his ordeal with Magellan in Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Callback to Impel Down and demonstrates character growth through past hardships.
keyMoments.quote: Poisons don't work well on me anymore!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Collapses
keyMoments.description: Luffy spontaneously collapses from Caesar's hidden oxygen manipulation ability.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite poison immunity, Luffy is vulnerable to other gas-based attacks.

abilities.description: Luffy has developed resistance to poisons from his exposure to Magellan's toxins in Impel Down.

reveals.information: Developed poison immunity from Impel Down experience

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Encounters Vergo
keyMoments.description: Law encounters Vergo in the laboratory, revealing their shared past connection.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Law's connection to Vergo and hints at his backstory with Doflamingo's organization.

keyMoments.title: Law Defeated by Vergo
keyMoments.description: Law is instantly defeated by Vergo, showing his vulnerability without his heart.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's weakened state and Vergo's overwhelming power.

relationships.description: Vergo knows Law from the past through Doflamingo's organization. Their reunion reveals a complicated history.

evolutionMoments.description: Law encounters Vergo in the laboratory.

reveals.information: Has a past connection with Vergo

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Heroic Dive
keyMoments.description: Sanji dives into a poisonous, freezing lake to rescue Kin'emon's torso from a shark.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's selfless heroism and post-timeskip abilities.

keyMoments.title: Blue Walk Debut
keyMoments.description: Sanji uses Blue Walk to run on water and escape the poisonous lake.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Sanji's underwater mobility technique.

abilities.description: A technique that allows Sanji to run on water surfaces, adapted from Fish-Man Karate principles.
An underwater kick technique used by Sanji.

reveals.information: Can use Blue Walk to run on water
